knimeNode.name: Files to Binary Objects
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds files as binary objects to the table

fullDescription.intro: This node loads the files referenced by the input table into binary objects and will add them to the table.
fullDescription.option: Column with the path to the files.
Name for the new column with the binary objects.

Append
A new column will be appended.
Replace
The existing URI column will be replaced by the new binary object column.

ports.inPort: Table that contains an URI column. The files referenced will be loaded as binary objects.
ports.outPort: Input table with the binary objects added. The binary object column will either be appended to the table or will replace the URI column, depending on the set settings.
